name: Wisp (Planschi)
description:
You control a little wisp which can only traverse lighted surfaces

A/D  to move. Space to jump.

A game by Planschi

Im happy for every input! Pls write a comment or you can write me at bm.suessdorf@gmail.com 

>>>>intended: you clip through the floor if you are in the shadow<<<<

CHEATS for accessability:

-if something goes wrong or you cant get further you can teleport to the next levels by pressing:

"1"->level 1

"2-">level2

"3"->level 3

-to reset game: "r"

ChangeLog:

-changed Cover image

- fixed bug: changed Trigger PhysicLayer because it didnt react on player entering to  reset on death
